content:
January   by Emma Hinchliffe Leave a Comment

NikhilLakhanpalMSB13 was chosen as the next CEO of the Georgetown University Alumni and Student Federal Credit Union on Jan PERIOD  PERIOD

Lakhanpalhas been aGUASFCUintern since the fall of  when he was selected as a member of the terms teller class PERIOD He later joined the member service and information technology departments and he currently serves as vice president of information technology PERIOD He will effectively become CEO March  PERIOD

Im excited to work with the six other board members who are not only some of the smartest and coolest people Ive ever met but share a passion to make the credit union a better place he said PERIOD They all understand that being on the board is not just about this upcoming year but about building on  years of hard work and dedication. lakhanpalhopes to improve customer service by implementing a remote technology deposit system and smart phone application PERIOD

He is also determined to improve the intern experience PERIOD

GUASFCUwouldnt be possible without the hard work of its interns he said PERIOD Its our job as the Board of Directors to make sure were recruiting the best people on campus and to make sure that for the people we recruit the credit union experience is worth remembering. outgoing CEO Katie Cohen COL  believes thatLakhanpalwill be a great asset toGUASFCUin the future PERIOD

The nominating committee is very proud of the incoming Board of Directors and confident that the credit union is poised for continued success she wrote in an email PERIOD

title: New GUASFCU CEO to Start March 1
